children: Function call and multiplication: - L(du, u, p, t) for in-place operator evaluation, - du = L(u, p, t) for out-of-place operator evaluation

If the operator is not a constant, update it with (u,p,t). A mutating form, i.e. update_coefficients!(A,u,p,t) that changes the internal coefficients, and a out-of-place form B = update_coefficients(A,u,p,t).
